properties.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northwest Blue Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 3:46AM PST until February 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...MOUNTAIN SNOW OVER THE WEEKEND...

.A weather system will pass over the Pacific Northwest bringing
moderate to heavy mountain snow. Snow will start this morning and
increase late today and overnight. Gusty winds could lead to
areas of blowing and drifting snow. More light mountain snow
showers expected Sunday afternoon into President's Day.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 15
inches. Some blowing and drifting snow will be possible tonight
and Sunday.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon,
Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel over the
Blue mountains could become very difficult. Expect possible
delays traveling on I-84.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY
